trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mars
There were no other sightings in Mars on or around November 16th 2012
divs: sighting detailsdriving from mars, pa to cranberry, pa on 11\16\12 around 445 - 5 pm. 3 lights in a triangle formation very bright in the sky caught my attention immediately as i rounded a bend. i was unsure what the object was at first. after watching it for a few minutes, i called a friend to look out of her house to see if she could observe it. the objest(s) appeared to climb in altitude. i felt unsure of what i was seeing. i lost sight of the object(s) as i continued down the road. looking back now, i should have stopped and recorded the event on my phone. i do have 2 photos however.
Summary: 3 objects in a triangle formation appearing to have flame shooting out the back
